name: DOOA
description:
Different casual puzzle game of 2022. To pass the levels in the game, position the shooters to collect all the stars in one shot and press the shoot button.

Fun to play, easy to understand, confusing to find. Words are not enough to describe, you should download and try it.

If you are tired of classic puzzle games and are looking for a more interactive game experience, this game is for you.

TIPS:

🎲 Shooters' arrows show the direction in which they throw the balls

🎲 You can stack shooters and have them shoot balls in different directions

🎲 You can put the shooters on the stars

🎲 You only have one shot chance for each level. If you use this chance, you will have to start the level again.

🎲 If you want to buy a costume, you can collect all the stars and earn stars by playing the same levels over and over.

GAMEPLAY:

🎮 Drag the shooters from your inventory to the appropriate spots and press the "Shot" button.

🎮 If you can't find it, click the "hint" button on the top right and get a hint.
